note.p: Death: Bad Muskau, Germany (18 or 19 November 1941)
Authority: AltName from The Times, 25 June 2001
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 101-112, plate, by Cherwell and F Simon
References: J S Rowlinson, 'The Third Law', review of D K Barkan, Walther Nernst and the Transition to Modern Physical Science in NR 2000 vol 54 pp 123-124
W van der Kloot, 'April 1915: Five Future Nobel Prize-Winners Inaugurate Weapons Of Mass Destruction And The Academic-Industrial-Military Complex' in NR 2004 vol 58 pp 149-160
Notes: Year Book of Austrian Academy and DSB give death date as 18 November 1941.
